settings.type_help: This extension only supports reCAPTCHA v2. The selected type must match the type of your reCAPTCHA credentials.

test.title: Test reCAPTCHA
test.help_text:
This test will use the current values entered above. Make sure to reload the test after modifying settings, and don't forget to save once the test passes!
Below may not reflect the saved settings.

permissions.post_without_captcha: Create posts and discussions without captcha

forum.error: There was an error submitting reCAPTCHA. Try again.
forum.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Check the captcha and try again.

validation.recaptcha-unknown: An unknown error occurred while validating reCAPTCHA ({errors}).
